title: Weight checker US-UMEO-800Z
title_uz: Qadoqlangan mahsulot vaznini tekshiruvchi uskuna US-UMEO-800Z
short_description: This US-UMEO-800Z package weight checker is designed to improve work efficiency and quality. The equipment is equipped with a display screen. Designed for products from 10 grams to 3000 grams, the conveyor speed is 40m/min and the length of the conveyor belt is 650mm and the width is 400mm.
short_description_uz: Qadoqlangan mahsulot vaznini tekshiruvchi ushbu US-UMEO-800Z uskuna ish samaradorligi va sifatini oshirish uchun xizmat qiladi. Uskuna ma'lumotlar aks etuvchi ekran bilan jihozlangan. 10 grammdan 3000 grammgacha bo'lgan mahsulotlar uchun mo'ljallangan, konveyer tezligi 40m/min va konveyer tasmasining uzunligi 650 mm, kengligi esa 400 mm ni tashkil etadi.
short_description_ru: Устройство для проверки веса упаковки US-UMEO-800Z предназначено для повышения эффективности и качества работы. Оборудование оснащено дисплеем. Рассчитан на продукцию от 10 грамм до 3000 грамм, скорость конвейера составляет 40 м/мин, длина конвейерной ленты 650 мм, ширина 400 мм.
short_description_en: This US-UMEO-800Z package weight checker is designed to improve work efficiency and quality. The equipment is equipped with a display screen. Designed for products from 10 grams to 3000 grams, the conveyor speed is 40m/min and the length of the conveyor belt is 650mm and the width is 400mm.
long_description:
This US-UMEO-800Z package weight checker is designed to improve work efficiency and quality. The equipment is equipped with a display screen. Designed for products from 10 grams to 3000 grams, the conveyor speed is 40m/min and the length of the conveyor belt is 650mm and the width is 400mm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-UMEO-800Z
Weighting range................................................................................. 10-3000 gr.........................................................................................................
Belt speed 40m/min
Machine speed 70 pcs
Belt size 650*400 mm
long_description_uz:
Qadoqlangan mahsulot vaznini tekshiruvchi ushbu US-UMEO-800Z uskuna ish samaradorligi va sifatini oshirish uchun xizmat qiladi. Uskuna ma'lumotlar aks etuvchi ekran bilan jihozlangan. 10 grammdan 3000 grammgacha bo'lgan mahsulotlar uchun mo'ljallangan, konveyer tezligi 40m/min va konveyer tasmasining uzunligi 650 mm, kengligi esa 400 mm ni tashkil etadi.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-UMEO-800Z
Mahsulot vazni.................................................................................. 10-3000 gr.........................................................................................................
Tasma tezligi 40m/min
Uskuna tezligi 70 dona
Tasma o'lchami 650*400 mm
long_description_ru:
Устройство для проверки веса упаковки US-UMEO-800Z предназначено для повышения эффективности и качества работы. Оборудование оснащено дисплеем. Рассчитан на продукцию от 10 грамм до 3000 грамм, скорость конвейера составляет 40 м/мин, длина конвейерной ленты 650 мм, ширина 400 мм.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-UMEO-800Z
Вес продукта............................................................................... 10-3000 гр.......................................................................................................
Скорость ленты 40 м/мин
Скорость оборудования 70 шт.
Размер ремня 650*400 мм

This US-UMEO-800Z package weight checker is designed to improve work efficiency and quality. The equipment is equipped with a display screen. Designed for products from 10 grams to 3000 grams, the conveyor speed is 40m/min and the length of the conveyor belt is 650mm and the width is 400mm.
